Interface CoreAPI

public interface CoreAPI

Core LED Cube API.

Field Summary
static int GREEN
           
static int OFF
           
static int ORANGE
           
static int RED
           
 
Method Summary
 void clearCube()
          The Clear Cube method clears the internal representation of the LED cube, as well as switching off all the LEDs.
 int[][][] readCube()
          The readCube() method returns a representation of the cube as a three dimensional int array using the built-in status codes.
 void setCube(int[][][] status)
          Sets the cube to a particular state.
 void setLED(int status, int x, int y, int z)
          The setLED method sets a given LED to a particular state
 void setPlaneXY(int[][] status, int layer)
          sets an XY layer to the required states using a two dimensional int array.
 void setPlaneXZ(int[][] status, int layer)
          sets an XZ layer to the required states using a two dimensional int array.
 void setPlaneYZ(int[][] status, int layer)
          sets an YZ layer to the required states using a two dimensional int array.

Method Detail

clearCube

void clearCube()
The Clear Cube method clears the internal representation of the LED cube, as well as switching off all the LEDs.

setLED

void setLED(int status,
            int x,
            int y,
            int z)
The setLED method sets a given LED to a particular state

Parameters:
status - The status of the LED (OFF|RED|GREEN|ORANGE)
x - The x coordinate (0-7)
y - The y coordinate (0-7)
z - The z coordinate (0-7)
See Also:
status

Sets the cube to a particular state.

Parameters:
status[][][] - a three dimensional int array using status ints

status

setPlaneXY

void setPlaneXY(int[][] status,
                int layer)
sets an XY layer to the required states using a two dimensional int array.

Parameters:
status - The two dimensional int array keeping the new plane state
layer - The layer to be changed
See Also:
status

layer - The layer to be changed

readCube

int[][][] readCube()
The readCube() method returns a representation of the cube as a three dimensional int array using the built-in status codes.

Returns:
status[][][] The representative array of the cube
